mapper.select: SELECT CART.MEMBER_NO, CART.CART_NO, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_PRICE, CART.ORDER_QTY, (CART.ORDER_QTY*PRODUCT.PRODUCT_PRICE) FROM PRODUCT,CART WHERE PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO = CART.PRODUCT_NO AND CART.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
SELECT CART_NO, MEMBER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, ORDER_QTY FROM CART WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT CART_NO, MEMBER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, ORDER_QTY FROM CART WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT CART.CART_NO, CART.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER.MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER.MEMBER_PHONE, CART.PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME, CART.ORDER_QTY, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM CART,MEMBER,PRODUCT WHERE CART.MEMBER_NO = MEMBER.MEMBER_NO AND CART.PRODUCT_NO = PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO AND CART.CART_NO = #{cartNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART( CART_NO, MEMBER_NO, PRODUCT_NO, ORDER_QTY )VALUES ( CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{productNo}, #{orderQty} )
